attributes.additional_details: We care about the health and long-term livelihood of the whole population and want to prevent businesses being destroyed, livelihood of the nation being taken away, freedoms being limited, mental health being threatened causing more deaths in a long term than the ones caused by the virus.
attributes.background: We want parliament to stop anything similar to the national lockdown of spring-summer 2020, where all the restaurants, pubs, gyms and services were closed.
